name: The Fall (itch)
description:
World first endless faller!
Fall down as low as you can!

Controls:
WASD - Movement
R - Restrart
Tab - switch input Keyboard / Tobii Eyex

Tobii EyeX input:
Look where you want to move your body


Credits:
Grzegorz @Draculeq Śnieciński - Programming, Publishing
Piotr "Zombie" Chodun - Level Design, Character
Patryk @huginn18 Woźnicki - Enviroment
